mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont1)/count(*),1) nutr_cont1, ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont2)/count(*),1) nutr_cont2, ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont3)/count(*),1) nutr_cont3, ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont4)/count(*),1) nutr_cont4 FROM v_sj_sexcal v WHERE v.mem_sex = 'w'

SELECT ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont1)/count(*),1) nutr_cont1, ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont2)/count(*),1) nutr_cont2, ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont3)/count(*),1) nutr_cont3, ROUND(sum(v.amount*v.nutr_cont4)/count(*),1) nutr_cont4 FROM v_sj_sexcal v WHERE v.mem_sex = 'm'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM c_sj_foods f WHERE f.f_no = #{f_no}
